name: DASAN Networks
overview: DASAN Networks, Inc. offers networking, embedded, and triple play service (TPS) solutions in South Korea. The company primarily offers metro Ethernet, Ethernet switch, xDSL, and router products. Its Networks IP-DSLAM product line enables customers to extend intelligent networking service over existing phone line, as well as provides customers the ability to deploy the device and enables customers to access Internet multimedia services, such as VoD, on-line game, chatting, e-commerce, and remote-medical. The companyâ€™s Networks Ethernet Switch products enable wire-speed transmission required for managing high-density data switching application with advanced network security and management functions for enterprise units and ISPs. Its Networks FTTx technology products are designed for service providers to deliver ideal bandwidth application ranging from fast Internet access to interactive-service, video on demand, and voice communication through the dedicated optical fiber infrastructure. The companyâ€™s TPS device is a combined service of voice, data, and video on a single line, as well as for being capable of providing telephony service, Internet, and broadcasting service. DASAN Networks develops, manufactures, and supplies IP phone and IP set-top box. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Seongnam-si, South Korea.
